third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes Devon Larratt is ready and wants to pull Evgeny Prudnik, but there are other factors affecting the possibility of the match happening. He estimates a 50% chance of the match occurring on November 19th.

Devon Larratt.strength: Devon is in incredible shape and very strong right now.
Devon Larratt.health: Devon is healthy and ready to compete.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has been training hard and is ready for a serious match.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Prudnik is 100% ready and very dangerous at his weight class.
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Prudnik is known for his dominant performances and interesting personality.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin considers this a 50-50 match. Ermes feels incredible and confident, but Dave Chaffee is also a formidable opponent with a big heart.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Ermes has a very strong wrist and is confident in his abilities.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes believes he can beat Devon Larratt.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Dave has a big heart and no fear.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave is known for his strong performances and resilience.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin mentions that Georgii Dzeranov has a match against Sergey Kalinichenko but does not provide a prediction.
Engin confirms that Matt Mask is going to pull Sandris Sedis in the same event.
Engin is excited for this match, calling both athletes legends.
